{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Azure = Pulumi.Azure;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var example = Output.Create(Azure.DataShare.GetDatasetDataLakeGen2.InvokeAsync(new Azure.DataShare.GetDatasetDataLakeGen2Args
        {
            Name = "example-dsdlg2ds",
            ShareId = "example-share-id",
        }));
        this.Id = example.Apply(example => example.Id);
    }

    [Output("id")]
    public Output<string> Id { get; set; }
}
```

{{% example go %}}
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure/sdk/v3/go/azure/datashare"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		example, err := datashare.LookupDatasetDataLakeGen2(ctx, &datashare.LookupDatasetDataLakeGen2Args{
			Name:    "example-dsdlg2ds",
			ShareId: "example-share-id",
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		ctx.Export("id", example.Id)
		return nil
	})
}
```
